title: Stock Market Breadth Is Great. The Mag 7 Are Dragging.
excerpt: The stock market was rising on Thursday without help from the Magnificent Seven stocks. The S&P 500 was up 0.3%; 337 of its member stocks were on the rise. The Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight ETF, which gives us a look at the index if every stock had the same pull regardless of market cap, was up 0.6%
text: Stock Market Breadth Is Great. The Mag 7 Are Dragging.The stock market was rising on Thursday without help from the Magnificent Seven stocks.The S&P 500 was up 0.3%; 337 of its member stocks were on the rise. The Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight ETF, which gives us a look at the index if every stock had the same pull regardless of market cap, was up 0.6%.The Dow was up 145 points, or 0.4%. The Nasdaq Composite was down 0.2%.
html:
Stock Market Breadth Is Great. The Mag 7 Are Dragging.

The stock market was rising on Thursday without help from the Magnificent Seven stocks.

The S&P 500 was up 0.3%; 337 of its member stocks were on the rise. The Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight ETF, which gives us a look at the index if every stock had the same pull regardless of market cap, was up 0.6%.

The Dow was up 145 points, or 0.4%. The Nasdaq Composite was down 0.2%.
